alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 3:33PM PST until November 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 1500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Storm Warning above 1500 feet, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the second Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches below 2000 feet and 4 to 7 inches at 2000 feet and above. * WHERE...Willapa Hills. * WHEN...For the first Winter Storm Warning, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the second Winter Storm Warning, from 10 AM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
